attributes.action: To allow us to use public property to display the national flag
attributes.additional_details: Because we do not have the money to support other country’s citizens that come over illegally when we are in high national debt and we have OAP’s and veterans who are homeless or can barely afford to live we want our country to be united not divided we want to look after our own people and make our country great again
attributes.background: to remove illegal immigrants out of hotels so we use them to house elderly and veterans and reunite our country

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
